ComicInfo.Title: Ogden Marsh
ComicInfo.Summary: It all comes down to this, the fourth and final issue in this exclusive prequel to the Overture Films release THE CRAZIES. Terror and destruction has finally come downstream to the small town of Ogden Marsh and panic is spreading faster than the pathogen itself. The government has arrived with nefarious plans as survivors attempt to make their escape amidst a band of bloodthirsty crazies. The true, evil nature of the pathogen is finally revealed and the world around us will never be the same again. There will be blood - oh yes - there will be LOTS of blood. Can anyone possibly survive to tell the tale?
